About Me

Let Me Tell You A Few Things About Myself...

BIO

Aditya Rawat is an experienced 13 year old middle schooler, web developer, and programmer. Driven by life, he takes pride in providing you with the best portfolio website possible. As an 8th grader, his goals include building a full scale gaming PC and to be able to maintain absolute focus. In addition to his primary awesomeness, Aditya Rawat has been recognized by himself for his extraordinary commitment to finding the loopholes in everything.
